body: You further broaden your study of weapons to encompass multiple similar weapons.
name: Martial Versatility
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Humans/New Racial Rules/Human Feats/Martial Versatility

sections.body: Choose one combat feat you know that applies to a specific weapon (e.g., Weapon Focus). You can use that feat with any weapon within the same weapon group.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You may take this feat more than once. Each time it applies to a different feat.
sections.name: Special
